data.name: Rust
data.oracle_text: Counter target activated ability from an artifact source. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)
data.flavor_text:
"How dull it is to pause, to make an end,/ To rust unburnished, not to shine in use,/ As though to breathe were life!"
—Alfred, Lord Tennyson, "Ulysses"

data.name: Sage's Dousing
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}. If you control a Wizard, draw a card.
data.flavor_text:
"Curse these merrows and their meddling! Since coming near the river, I can't so much as sneeze without being soaked."
—Ashling the Pilgrim

data.name: Saw It Coming
data.oracle_text:
Counter target spell.
Foretell {1}{U} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)
data.flavor_text: "How predictable."

data.name: Scatter Arc
data.oracle_text:
Counter target noncreature spell.
Draw a card.
data.flavor_text: "Should your chosen emissary be able to fluctuate triharmonic pentodes, however unlikely, I shall shunt excess negavolt radicals."

data.name: Scattering Stroke
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell. Clash with an opponent. If you win, at the beginning of your next main phase, you may add an amount of {C} equal to that spell's mana value. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher mana value.)

data.name: Scatter to the Winds
data.oracle_text:
Counter target spell.
Awaken 3—{4}{U}{U} (If you cast this spell for {4}{U}{U}, also put three +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.)

data.name: Scent of Brine
data.oracle_text: Reveal any number of blue cards in your hand. Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each card revealed this way.

data.name: Second Guess
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell that's the second spell cast this turn.
data.flavor_text:
"I see where you're going with that. I don't like it."
—Dierk, geistmage

data.name: Silumgar's Command
data.oracle_text:
Choose two —
• Counter target noncreature spell.
• Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
• Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
• Destroy target planeswalker.

data.name: Silumgar's Scorn
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand.
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}. If you revealed a Dragon card or controlled a Dragon as you cast this spell, counter that spell instead.

data.name: Sinister Sabotage
data.oracle_text:
Counter target spell.
Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)
data.flavor_text:
"We have intel that some guilds have fallen under an invader's influence. Until we're sure, no venture succeeds."
—Lazav

data.name: Soul Manipulation
data.oracle_text:
Choose one or both —
• Counter target creature spell.
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
data.flavor_text:
"Birth and death are both reversible."
—Nicol Bolas

data.name: Spell Blast
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell with mana value X. (For example, if that spell's mana cost is {3}{U}{U}, X is 5.)
data.flavor_text: "Perhaps you could try throwing a rock? That might be better suited to your intellect."

data.name: Spell Blast
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell with mana value X. (For example, if that spell's mana cost is {3}{U}{U}, X is 5.)
data.flavor_text: Call it the thinking mage's version of brute force.

data.oracle_text: Counter target spell with mana value X. (For example, if that spell's mana cost is {3}{U}{U}, X is 5.)

data.oracle_text: Counter target spell with mana value X. (For example, if that spell's mana cost is {3}{U}{U}, X is 5.)

Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Counter target spell with mana value X.

data.name: Spell Burst
data.oracle_text:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Counter target spell with mana value X.
data.flavor_text: The brutish mage's version of thinking.

data.name: Spell Contortion
data.oracle_text:
Multikicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}. Draw a card for each time Spell Contortion was kicked.

data.name: Spell Counter
data.oracle_text:
Counter target spell.
Gotcha — If an opponent says "spell" or "counter," you may say "Gotcha!" When you do, return Spell Counter from your graveyard to your hand.
data.flavor_text: Playing *Unhinged*, . . .

data.name: Spell Crumple
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on the bottom of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard. Put Spell Crumple on the bottom of its owner's library.

data.name: Spelljack
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard. You may play it without paying its mana cost for as long as it remains exiled. (If it has X in its mana cost, X is 0.)

data.name: Spell Pierce
data.oracle_text: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.
data.flavor_text: For all their planning, Tamiyo and Kaito were unprepared to face the full power of a Phyrexian praetor.

data.name: Spell Pierce
data.oracle_text: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.
data.flavor_text:
"A fool's fire is quickly quenched."
—Shaper Kumena

data.name: Spell Pierce
data.oracle_text: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.
data.flavor_text:
"There's a hole in your plan."
—Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

data.name: Spell Pierce
data.oracle_text: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.
data.flavor_text: "If you make me spill my drink, you're buying me a new one."

data.name: Spell Pierce
data.oracle_text: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.
data.flavor_text: A great wizard always has a few surprises up their sleeve.

data.name: Spell Pierce
data.oracle_text: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.

data.name: Spell Rupture
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.
data.flavor_text:
"Like water, mana will drain from an inferior vessel."
—Jalan Tosk, Simic forcemage

data.name: Spellshift
data.oracle_text: Counter target instant or sorcery spell. Its controller reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal an instant or sorcery card. That player may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Then the player shuffles.

data.name: Spell Shrivel
data.oracle_text:
Devoid (This card has no color.)
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

data.name: Spell Snare
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell with mana value 2.
data.flavor_text: Every culture has its unlucky numbers. In a city where you're either alone, in a crowd, or being stabbed in the back, two is the worst number of all.

data.name: Spell Snip
data.oracle_text:
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
data.flavor_text:
"Magic cast through a hand of flesh is just as weak as the flesh itself."
—Lodus of the Ethersworn

data.name: Spell Snuff
data.oracle_text:
Counter target spell.
Fateful hour — If you have 5 or less life, draw a card.
data.flavor_text: "Good night."

data.name: Spell Suck
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell, then assemble a Contraption. (Put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.)
data.flavor_text: S-U-C-K

data.name: Spell Swindle
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell. Create X Treasure tokens, where X is that spell's mana value. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

data.name: Spell Syphon
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each blue permanent you control.
data.flavor_text: Warrik Brutehexer felt betrayed that his aura favored the depths of the Wanderbrine River over its rightful place, hovering around him.

data.name: Split Decision
data.oracle_text: Will of the council — Choose target instant or sorcery spell. Starting with you, each player votes for denial or duplication. If denial gets more votes, counter the spell. If duplication gets more votes or the vote is tied, copy the spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

data.name: Squelch
data.oracle_text:
Counter target activated ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)
Draw a card.
data.flavor_text: Oku-Doku had gone through all the motions: the same akki cursewords, the same ingredients with their horrid stink, the same rude gestures. Yet not a person died.

data.name: Statute of Denial
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell. If you control a blue creature, draw a card, then discard a card.
data.flavor_text: "Pyrotechnic activity of any sort is strictly prohibited. It is irrelevant that today is a holiday."

data.name: Steel Sabotage
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Counter target artifact spell.
• Return target artifact to its owner's hand.
data.flavor_text:
"You are hopelessly obsolete, my brothers. Come and join the Great Work."
—Rhmir, Hand of the Augur

data.name: Stifle
data.oracle_text: Counter target activated or triggered ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)
data.flavor_text:
"If I wanted your opinion, I'd have told you what it was."
—Pemmin, Riptide survivor

data.name: Stifle
data.oracle_text: Counter target activated or triggered ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

data.name: Stifle
data.oracle_text: Counter target activated or triggered ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

Metalcraft — This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control three or more artifacts.
Counter target spell.
data.flavor_text: Obsessed with the pursuit of knowledge above all else, vedalken can appear to be cold and emotionless.

data.name: Stubborn Denial
data.oracle_text:
Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {1}.
Ferocious — If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, counter that spell instead.
data.flavor_text: The Temur have no patience for subtlety.

data.name: Stymied Hopes
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
data.flavor_text: When a god's will is against you, the day never ends well.

data.name: Sublime Epiphany
data.oracle_text:
Choose one or more —
• Counter target spell.
• Counter target activated or triggered ability.
• Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
• Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control.
• Target player draws a card.

data.name: Suffocating Blast
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell and Suffocating Blast deals 3 damage to target creature.

data.name: Summary Dismissal
data.oracle_text: Exile all other spells and counter all abilities.
data.flavor_text: "Let's start fresh, shall we?"

data.name: Summoner's Bane
data.oracle_text: Counter target creature spell. Create a 2/2 blue Illusion creature token.
data.flavor_text:
"I don't need to have the perfect plan. My foe just has to have an imperfect one."
—Jace Beleren

data.name: Supreme Will
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
• Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

data.name: Swan Song
data.oracle_text: Counter target enchantment, instant, or sorcery spell. Its controller creates a 2/2 blue Bird creature token with flying.
data.flavor_text:
"The most enlightened mages create beauty from violence."
—Medomai the Ageless

data.name: Swan Song
data.oracle_text: Counter target enchantment, instant, or sorcery spell. Its controller creates a 2/2 blue Bird creature token with flying.
data.flavor_text: The gracefulness of their flight makes one wonder whether Nature or, indeed, a rare sort of Magic lifts their wings.

data.name: Swift Silence
data.oracle_text: Counter all other spells. Draw a card for each spell countered this way.
data.flavor_text:
"This world may not know peace, but in my presence you *will* know quiet."
—Augustin IV

data.name: Syncopate
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.
data.flavor_text: "Fool! Can't you see the tide has turned against you?"

data.name: Syncopate
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.
data.flavor_text: The fire spell stuttered and broke. Its pieces reached Teferi out of rhythm, meaningless.

data.name: Syncopate
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.
data.flavor_text: "Patience, mage. Killing you now would be too easy."

data.name: Syncopate
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.
data.flavor_text:
"Memories can't simply be washed away. The mind must be scrubbed clean."
—Ambassador Laquatus

data.name: Syphon Essence
data.oracle_text: Counter target creature or planeswalker spell. Create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
data.flavor_text: The third step in creating a skaab requires draining the body of blood and replacing it with *viscus vitae*, a mixture of angel's blood and lamp oil.

data.name: Tale's End
data.oracle_text: Counter target activated ability, triggered ability, or legendary spell.
data.flavor_text:
"When you are gone, will anyone remember your story?"
—Unknown

data.name: Teferi's Response
data.oracle_text:
Counter target spell or ability an opponent controls that targets a land you control. If a permanent's ability is countered this way, destroy that permanent.
Draw two cards.

data.name: Temur Charm
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. It fights target creature you don't control.
• Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
• Creatures with power 3 or less can't block this turn.

data.name: Test of Talents
data.oracle_text: Counter target instant or sorcery spell. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with the same name as that spell and exile them. That player shuffles, then draws a card for each card exiled from their hand this way.

data.name: Thassa's Intervention
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Look at the top X cards of your library. Put up to two of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
• Counter target spell unless its controller pays twice {X}.
data.flavor_text: "I bring a flood that nothing can withstand."

data.name: Thassa's Rebuff
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}, where X is your devotion to blue. (Each {U} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to blue.)
data.flavor_text: To resist Thassa is to deny the rising tide.

data.name: Thoughtbind
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell with mana value 4 or less.
data.flavor_text:
"As the rest of the mortal world waged war, Lady Azami and her students invaded tomes of knowledge. Their search yielded spells critical in the fight."
—*Observations of the Kami War*

data.name: Thought Collapse
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell. Its controller mills three cards.
data.flavor_text:
"I can think of no greater punishment than answering your question in full."
—Lazav

data.name: Thwart
data.oracle_text:
You may return three Islands you control to their owner's hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Counter target spell.

data.name: Tibalt's Trickery
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell. Choose 1, 2, or 3 at random. Its controller mills that many cards, then exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile a nonland card with a different name than that spell. They may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Then they put the exiled cards on the bottom of their library in a random order.

data.name: Time Stop
data.oracle_text: End the turn. (Exile all spells and abilities from the stack, including this card. The player whose turn it is discards down to their maximum hand size. Damage wears off, and "this turn" and "until end of turn" effects end.)

data.name: Trap Essence
data.oracle_text: Counter target creature spell. Put two +1/+1 counters on up to one target creature.
data.flavor_text:
"Meat sustains the body. The spirit requires different sustenance."
—Arel the Whisperer

data.name: Traumatic Visions
data.oracle_text:
Counter target spell.
Basic landcycling {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

data.name: Trickbind
data.oracle_text:
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Counter target activated or triggered ability. If a permanent's ability is countered this way, activated abilities of that permanent can't be activated this turn. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

data.name: Turn Aside
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell that targets a permanent you control.
data.flavor_text:
"There are tides beyond those in the sea that are driven by Innistrad's silver moon. If you learn their patterns, you can channel them in fascinating ways."
—Tamiyo

data.name: Turn Aside
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell that targets a permanent you control.
data.flavor_text: "It's not my job to ask our leaders about their experiments at the Knowledge Pool. It's my job to make sure they can continue performing them."

data.name: Undermine
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell. Its controller loses 3 life.
data.flavor_text: "Which would you like first, the insult or the injury?"

data.name: Undersimplify
data.oracle_text: Choose target spell. If it's a creature spell, it perpetually gets -2/-0. Counter that spell unless its controller pays {2}.

data.name: Unified Will
data.oracle_text: Counter target spell if you control more creatures than that spell's controller.
data.flavor_text:
"We're glad to be of service—to be an audience to your failure."
—Maizah Shere, Tazeem lullmage

data.name: Unsubstantiate
data.oracle_text: Return target spell or creature to its owner's hand.
data.flavor_text:
"Nicely done, Jace. You always were good at disappearing acts."
—Liliana Vess

data.name: Unsubstantiate
data.oracle_text: Return target spell or creature to its owner's hand.

—Jhoira

data.name: Whirlwind Denial
data.oracle_text: For each spell and ability your opponents control, counter it unless its controller pays {4}.
data.flavor_text: "No, no, and ... no."

data.name: Whirlwind Denial
data.oracle_text: For each spell and ability your opponents control, counter it unless its controller pays {4}.
data.flavor_text:
"If they try to storm your palace, you must become the storm."
—*Handbook of Imperial Spellcraft*

data.name: Wild Ricochet
data.oracle_text: You may choose new targets for target instant or sorcery spell. Then copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
data.flavor_text: "I knew that trick long before your great-grandmother's great-grandmother was born."

data.name: Withering Boon

data.flavor_text:
"Life for life: this is the immutable law."
—Panya, Granger Guildmage

data.name: Wizard's Retort
data.oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a Wizard.
Counter target spell.
data.flavor_text:
"The second mage learned to dissipate blasts of lightning. Threat and response: thus did the study of magic progress."
—Naban, dean of iteration

data.name: You Find the Villains' Lair

• Foil Their Scheme — Counter target spell.
